title: Sylvia
lyrics:
[Intro]
(
Ooh, you are
)
Whoa, oh yeah
(
Ooh, you are
)
[Verse 1]
Mhm, mmm, Sylvia (
Sylvia
)
You know you're getting to me now
Mmm-mmm, Sylvia
You gently touched my heart somehow (
Somehow
)
Yesterday, you made me happy as a child at play
Just like the summer sun that warms my heart and move on
Now you are gone (
Ooh, you are
)
[Verse 2]
Whoa, oh, oh, Sylvia (
Ooh, Sylvia
)
You're everything that I adore
Ah, the sweetest song
The kindest thought in me even more, yeah
Tenderly, that's how you whispered that you love me
As if a raindrop kissed my ear and disappeared
Now you are gone (
Ooh, you are
)
[Bridge]
Whoa, oh, oh yeah (
Ooh, you are
)
You know I love my little Sylvia
(
Ooh, Sylvia, ooh, ooh, ooh, ah, ah
)
Whoa, oh yeah

[Verse 3]
And yesterday, I fell in love with you all the way
Tenderly, you lit a spark here in my heart
Now you are gone (
Sylvia
)
[Outro]
Mhm, mmm, Sylvia (
Sylvia
)
Why did you leave me, Sylvia? (
Sylvia
)
I'm crazy 'bout ya, Sylvia (
Sylvia
)
You know I love my little Sylvia
